ElasticsearchDestinationConfiguration.UpdateRequires: No interruption. If you change the delivery stream destination from an Amazon ES destination to an Amazon S3 or Amazon Redshift destination, update requires some interruptions.

RedshiftDestinationConfiguration.UpdateRequires: No interruption. If you change the delivery stream destination from an Amazon Redshift destination to an Amazon ES destination, update requires some interruptions.

S3DestinationConfiguration.UpdateRequires: No interruption. If you change the delivery stream destination from an Amazon S3 destination to an Amazon ES destination, update requires some interruptions.
